Q: Can I bring a friend to a mingle & munch dinner?
A: Yes. When you receive a reservation link, you can select to add a reservation for 1 or 2 people. If your friend is also a mingle & munch member, just make sure you don't both make a 2-person reservation to the same event.

Q: How often can I expect to receive an invitation to a shared dinner?
A: Initially you can expect to receive an invitation every Thursday and Saturday. So don't worry if you can't make it. The next invitation is just a few days away.

Q: What happens if I need to cancel after having accepted an invitation?
A: If you need to cancel, you can just reach out to us and let us know. If you cancel more than 24h before then planned dinner, we will reimburse your $10 booking fee.
